title: Riot, ban me.
body:
Tired of this fucking trash game, always tempted to play it yet all I do is int games when I know we have lost. Just ban the account so I am not tempted to pay at all, thanks.

Account name is eeweeP

replies.body: You can open a player support ticket, and they can help you disable your account.

Haha! If I were working for Riot I'd say something like, "Ok. Done!" [presses button and bans]. But your response was perfect!
pretty sure you would be instantly crying the moment they actually did it
Pretty sure I fucking wouldn't be because I have had gaps of over 6+ months on this game, I genuinely don't care about the account and I'm not giving it away.

well then at least leave as a legend
You can send a ticket to Riot asking them to disable your accounts.
Hey there, you can request a riot support ticket and they are willing to do this. Most likely they won't see this on the boards tho.

I dont really see blatant inting in your match history. Maybe you died a few times but KDA looks decent for silver. Maybe youre just tilted?

Open a support ticket and ask them to suspend your account.

Or go play a single game and spam "kys" as many times as you can, that is the quicker way to get your account perma banned. Let us know if it works.

None of my KDA's are good, I die once and creativly int i.e build properly but just walk into jungle/die to laner and force the lose.

Team ahs no clue what's happening because they're silver and don't use unlocked cam.
What they said, if the support ticket thing doesn't work, just drop the N bomb.
N word doesnt work anymore. Rarely are people banned for it. The word I suggested will boot someone right out though.
